attributes.action: seriously consider viable plans to drastically improve the UK's internet infrastructure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The world is changing fast, financial crisis' can change on an hourly basis, communication between business' are in real time, the modern world revolves around the ability to communicate and relay information fast.

Britain has been lagging behind (forgive the pun) for too long, other countries have fast reliable connections to almost every household and business and Britain still languishes on mostly 8mb ADSL connections through copper wires older then almost everyone alive.

Britain needs to seriously consider measures to improve its connection capacity and speeds, least our rapidly out dated internet infrastructure damages our economy.

Britain has a long history of being a leader in developing new technologies, the industrial revolution began here, arguably the beginnings of modern technology and industry today. Britain will need an up to date and capable communications infrastructure if we are to maintain our reputation for being a leader in technology and business.
